abstract: John D. Rock was a blunt-talking General Motors executive who tried unsuccessfully to save the Oldsmobile division.
snippet: John D. Rock was a blunt-talking General Motors executive who tried unsuccessfully to save the Oldsmobile division.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT, Nov. 20 — John D. Rock, a blunt-talking General Motors executive who tried unsuccessfully to save the Oldsmobile division, died Friday in Hot Springs, S.D. He was 71.

headline.main: John D. Rock, Former G.M. Executive, Is Dead at 71
headline.print_headline: John D. Rock, 71, of G.M.; Stalled Oldsmobile’s Demise
